entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
